info.author: Eray Erdin
info.description:
# esvg

![](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-0.1.0-red.svg)
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-prealpha-red.svg)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg)](LICENSE)

esvg is a svg processing library for Python. It is mainly created for `syntax` package of [linglib](https://github.com/erayerdin/linglib) library to render AST into vector-based graphics.

## Requirements

 - Python 3
 - lxml 3.5.0
info.name: esvg
info.summary: esvg is a svg processing library for Python.
